Welcome to Spencer Mills Orthodox Presbyterian Church

Spencer Mills is a vibrant, confessionally Reformed church that seeks to make disciples of Jesus Christ who worship God with great joy, walk alongside one another in Christian love, and seek to share the good news of the gospel of Jesus Christ with those around us near and far. At Spencer Mills you will hear God's Word preached each and every Sunday and be comforted by the peace we have with God in Jesus Christ.
